Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Shotgun \Shot"gun`\, n. A light, smooth-bored gun, often double-barreled, especially designed for firing small shot at short range, and killing small game. [1913 Webster]
shotgun n : firearm that is a double-barreled smoothbore shoulder weapon for firing shot at short ranges [syn: {scattergun}] [also: {shotgunning}, {shotgunned}]
